price: Saí a campo armados, leve ou pesadamente, e lutai com vossas riquezas e vós mesmos, no caminho de Allah. Isso vos é melhor. Se soubésseis!
arabic: ٱنفِرُواْ خِفَافٗا وَثِقَالٗا وَجَٰهِدُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنفُسِكُمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: infirū khifāfan wathiqālan wajāhidū bi-amwālikum wa-anfusikum fī sabīli al-lahi dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
